Name: 芯之迷城
About the game: This is a casual game to avoid all kinds of traps by walking, Through [WASD] to operate the small robot to move, Use special skills through [space], Through the [mouse] to adjust the perspective to avoid all kinds of traps, victory to the end. Features: At present, there are 12 kinds of small robots in the game, each of which can achieve different breakthrough methods through its own characteristics or special skills. At present, there are 84 levels waiting for you to explore the challenges.
